content.rendered:
Cumin seed has a significant demand as a spice all around the globe especially in the places where spicy food is preferred. It is an integral part of the recipes in various cultures. After pepper, jeera is considered to be the most important spice in the world. Cumin in grounded form also forms part of various spicy mixtures, most important being ‘Garam masala’ (extensively used throughout South Asia), which are again used to add pungent flavours to the dishes and cuisines. 

Packing: 25/50 kg Jute bag

Inspection: SGS/Other inspection firm based on client’s requirement

Loadability: 15MT per 20ft container

Delivery: 15 Days from  order confirmation

Origin: India

excerpt.rendered:
Cumin seed is an dried fruit of an thin stem cumin plant of Parsley family. It is an oblong shaped dark colored, sharp flavored aromatic spice. Being one of the most distinguished suppliers and keeping in phase with the never ending demand of our client, Adrianna Springs Impex has imprinted itself as one of the leading Cumin Exporters in India.

Owing to the best practices from procuring to the final delivery we at Adrianna Springs Impex intend to focus on the highest quality delivered at right time have made us the leading Cumin Suppliers in India domestically.
